title: React Ink UI components for Ralph
description: Build React Ink terminal UI components with FULL feature parity to original ralph.zsh. REFERENCE: ralph.zsh lines 199-1100 contain all UI functions (_ralph_color_*, _ralph_progress_*, _ralph_show_*).

acceptanceCriteria.text: REFERENCE: Read ralph.zsh _ralph_color_story_id, _ralph_color_model, _ralph_color_cost functions
REFERENCE: Read ralph.zsh _ralph_progress_bar, _ralph_progress_color functions
REFERENCE: Read ralph.zsh _ralph_show_iteration_status for full box layout
Create ui/ directory with React Ink + Bun setup
Create components/Box.tsx - Unicode box drawing (╔═╗║╚═╝)
Create components/ProgressBar.tsx - colored bars with percentage colors (green→yellow→red)
Create components/StoryId.tsx - colored by type (US=blue, BUG=red, V=purple, AUDIT=magenta, MP=cyan)
Create components/ModelBadge.tsx - colored by model (opus=yellow, sonnet=cyan, haiku=green)
Create components/CostDisplay.tsx - colored by amount (low=green, med=yellow, high=red)
Create components/IterationBox.tsx - full iteration status with all progress bars
Create components/ModelRouting.tsx - shows all type→model mappings
Create components/StartupBanner.tsx - Ralph version, path, stats, criteria count
Create components/LiveOutput.tsx - streaming Claude output
Implement file watching (fs.watch) for live criteria updates
Implement debounced updates (500ms) to prevent flicker
Implement ANSI cursor positioning for in-place updates (no scroll)
Support compact mode (single line) vs full mode (box)
Add unit tests for each component
Test: Visual parity with original ralph.zsh output
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
